title: Home Value Machine
description: An application that takes in pictures, and creates a value of each room shown, as well as overall value, based on cleanliness, design, and style.

title: In Class Submission
description: A machine that allows students to hand in their work, scans the answers (works best with numbers or multiple choice), and prints out a grade.

title: Dance Generator
description: For all white people trying to learn about black culture.

title: Paint/Window Tint Mixer
description: Makes a paint of an exact hexadecimal or decimal value based on input from user, making a car with defined paint job.
